preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 90 g of Praseodymium, 40 g of Silicon, 10 g of Samarium, and 20 g of Tin using a precision scale. 
 2. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine the measured metals thoroughly using a spatula until a uniform mixture is achieved.
